front.title: MP-BGP Extension and the Procedures for IPv4/IPv6 Mapping Advertisement

abstract.t: This document defines MP-BGP extension and the procedures for IPv4 service delivery in multi-domain IPv6-only underlay networks. It defines a new BGP path attribute known as the "4map6" in conjunction with the existing AFI/SAFI in IPv6-only routing paradigm for transferring IPv4/IPv6 address mapping rule within and across IPv6-only domains. In addition, the behavior of each type of network node in this extension is also illustrated.
